author: Reuters Editorial
title: US STOCKS SNAPSHOT-Wall Street rises at open as U.S.-China trade talks progress
text:
May 22 (Reuters) - Wall Street opened higher for the second straight day on Tuesday, boosted by gains in tech stocks as trade talks between the United States and China gained momentum.
The Dow Jones Industrial Average rose 34.26 points, or 0.14 percent, at the open to 25,047.55.
The S&P 500 opened higher by 5.33 points, or 0.20 percent, at 2,738.34. The Nasdaq Composite gained 26.81 points, or 0.36 percent, to 7,420.85 at the opening bell. (Reporting by Medha Singh in Bengaluru; Editing by Sriraj Kalluvila)
